channel.title: 1.how to make certain items or potions for donators only.2how to change potion
channel.description: i have overloads and i need that to be for only donators. also i need help making my overloaded's drinkable or i can make str pots overloads but how do i change the effect of it like add this and that so it would have the effect of a real overload. plxx help and i'll give u a lvl 72 acc with cat mask.

item.title: 1.how to make certain items or potions for donators only.2how to change potion
item.dc:creator: @xwolfex xwolfex
item.description:
@xwolfex wrote:

[quote=“rangadanger7, post:2, topic:367012”]case ????: // overload (4) if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.defPot = true; c.defPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.attPot = true; c.attPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.magePot = true; c.magePotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.rangePot = true; c.rangePotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.setAnimation(829); c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.playerLevel[0] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.playerLevel[1] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4008); c.playerLevel[6] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.playerLevel[6] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[6]+"", 4014); c.playerLevel[4] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.playerLevel[4] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[4]+"", 4010); c.deleteItem(????(4), slot, 1); c.addItem(????(3), 1); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006); c.strPotTimer = 60; if(c.currentHealth <= 0) { break; } c.sM("You drink some of your overload potion."); c.sM("You have 3 doses of potion left."); put this in potions.java just above case 2432, and repeat for each dose, changing id’s; ??? = id’s
BTW, tell me if this works, i jsut amde it up quickly - this will not make only certain people can use it, you will have to change that in a seperate file.[/quote]

sorry this didnet work… and i’m using A CODEUAS 508 LODING 525 BASE. WELL IF ANY1 CAN HELP ME ADD EFFECT OF OVERLOAD LIKE TO MAKE IT DRINKABLE THAT WOULD BE HELPFUL AND I’LL PAY THEM 5 DOLLERS. its server sided and i have no potions.java file i thiunk my potions are in my item select file.

Read full topic
item.source: 1.how to make certain items or potions for donators only.2how to change potion

item.title: 1.how to make certain items or potions for donators only.2how to change potion
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

If you want it to work with certain players just set the rights on the case… Don’t need a second file.

Also, say what base you’re using if your asking for help!

Read full topic

item.title: 1.how to make certain items or potions for donators only.2how to change potion
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

case ????: // overload (4) if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.defPot = true; c.defPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.attPot = true; c.attPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.magePot = true; c.magePotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; c.rangePot = true; c.rangePotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.cba = c.abc / 5; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.setAnimation(829); c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.playerLevel[0] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.playerLevel[1] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4008); c.playerLevel[6] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.playerLevel[6] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[6]+"", 4014); c.playerLevel[4] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.playerLevel[4] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[4]+"", 4010); c.deleteItem(????(4), slot, 1); c.addItem(????(3), 1); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006); c.strPotTimer = 60; if(c.currentHealth <= 0) { break; } c.sM("You drink some of your overload potion."); c.sM("You have 3 doses of potion left."); put this in potions.java just above case 2432, and repeat for each dose, changing id’s; ??? = id’s
BTW, tell me if this works, i jsut amde it up quickly - this will not make only certain people can use it, you will have to change that in a seperate file.
